markdownRemark.html:
This starter has been forked and upgraded to Gatsby v2.

This is a Gatsby v2 fork of gatsby-starter-casper by @haysclark. The upgrade to v2 was mostly done by @hnspn with a little help from the folks at GatsbyCentral.

Here's a little recommended reading for Gatsby v2.

  • First, what's new in v2
  • Next, when should I upgrade?
  • The Gatsby v2 announcement blog post

If you do decide to upgrade, these articles will help you do that.

  • Getting started with Gatsby v2
  • Should I rebuild my site for Gatsby v2?
  • How do layouts work in Gatsby v2
  • StaticQuery in Gatsby v2

Finally, here's a cheat sheet we prepared to help during the upgrade:

  • Gatsby v2 refactoring cheat sheet

node.name: Casper User
node.bio: Yeah, I like animals better than people sometimes... Especially dogs. Dogs are the best. Every time you come home, they act like they haven't seen you in a year. And the good thing about dogs... is they got different dogs for different people.
